空白函数：函数内容完全由用户编写，用于页面组件属性配置和事件绑定\r\n:
Blank function: the content of the function is completely written by the user, used for page component property
  configuration and event binding.
远程函数：系统将会根据参数组成 Ajax 请求，由用户在这里编写 Ajax 回调:
Remote function: the system will compose the Ajax request according to the parameters, and the user writes the Ajax
 callback function here, which is used for page component attribute configuration and event binding.
远程函数是异步函数，函数返回 promise。可以使用 then 回调在远程函数:
The remote function is an asynchronous function that returns a promise and can use the then callback to execute the next function after
 the remote function is executed asynchronously
调用其他远程函数示例如下：lesscode['${func:getApiData: Examples of calls to other remote functions are as follows:lesscode['${func:getApiData}']().then((res) => do(res))
函数用于页面组件属性时：函数必须有返回值，该返回值将会赋值给组件属性\r\n:
When the function is used in a page component property: the function must have a return value, and the return value
  will be assigned to the component property.
函数用于组件或页面事件时：函数将在事件触发时发起 Ajax 请求，并执行该回调函:
When the function is used for component or page events: the function will initiate an Ajax request when the event
 is triggered, and execute the callback function.
函数用于组件或页面事件时：函数将在事件触发时执行\r\n: When the function is used in a component or page event: the function will be executed when the event is triggered.
可以使用 “lesscode.变量标识” 唤起自动补全功能，必须通过编辑器自动补:

  corresponding variable through the editor's auto-completion function to obtain or modify the variable value.
可以使用 “lesscode.函数名称” 唤起自动补全功能，必须通过编辑器自动补:
You can use "lesscode.function name" to invoke the auto-completion function, and you must select the corresponding
  function through the editor's auto-completion function to call other functions in the APP.
